EventGhost.PythonScript(u'import requests

homeAssistantURL = getattr(eg.globals, "homeAssistantURL")
homeAssistantPassword = getattr(eg.globals, "homeAssistantPassword")

url = homeAssistantURL + "/api/states/computer_activity.gaming_pc?api_password=" + homeAssistantPassword
headers = {'content-type': 'application/json'}
data = '{"state": true, "attributes": {"hidden": true, "focus": "overwatch"}}'
response = requests.post(url, data, headers=headers)
